archimate:Principle.name: <<ELAP:ArchitecturePrinciple>> Transparency of the administrative environment
archimate:Principle.documentation: http://data.europa.eu/2sa/elap/transparency-of-the-administrative-environment Enabling visibility inside the administrative environment of a public administration. Rationale Enabling visibility within the administrative environment of a public administration. It is about enabling other public administrations, citizens and businesses to view and understand administrative rules, processes, data, services and decision-making processes. Principle Source Transparency Underlying Principle (3) of the European Interoperability Framework (EIF)
